Package org.radrails.ide.ui

Class Summary
RadRails This class controls all aspects of the application's execution.
RadRailsActionBarAdvisor An action bar advisor is responsible for creating, adding, and disposing of the actions added to a workbench window.
RadRailsIDEPlugin The main plugin class to be used in the desktop.
RadRailsWorkbenchAdvisor The main workbench class.
RadRailsWorkbenchWindowAdvisor This class specifies which components to draw on the main IDE, including the perspective bar, fast view bar, and status bar.
